mapper.select: SELECT plan_attraction_id as planAttractionId, seq as `order`, memo, plan_id as planId, content_id as contentId FROM plan_attraction WHERE plan_id = #{planId} ORDER BY seq

SELECT pa.plan_attraction_id, a.content_id, a.content_type_id, a.title, a.addr1, a.addr2, a.zipcode, a.tel, a.first_image, a.first_image2, a.readcount, a.sido_code, a.gugun_code, a.latitude, a.longitude, a.mlevel, pa.seq, pa.memo FROM plan_attraction pa JOIN plan p ON pa.plan_id = p.plan_id JOIN attraction_info a ON a.content_id = pa.content_id WHERE p.plan_id = #{planId} ORDER BY pa.seq
